Summary: bright light with a triange mist under the light
divs: sighting detailsit was around 8:00pm on 9\19\of 09 i was playing soccer in my back yard with my cousins and one of my friends i was the goallie of my team and everyone was on the other side of the yard.what cought my attention was a mist like substance the shape of a triangle i started to look closer at it for about 15 seconds and above the mist there was a bright light above it.i thought it was a helocopter but it was to high and it was not moving.it seemed like the mist was attached to the bright light,the mist was getting bigger as i was looking at it.i called my cousins and my friend over but by the time they got over the bright light above the mist dissapeared within a second.when they came the mist was still there for about 20 seconds and slowley the mist started to get narrower as time was passing.the mist looked like it was getting sucked up by something but i dont know what im assuming it was the bright light that dissapeared.i lost sight of the object because it dissapeared.after all this happend i felt shocked because i never seen anything like it and when i was talking about it i was shaking.that is the sighting i seen in wich i think is not from this world
